page.title: 17One girl's week day.
page.content: In the morning I do my teeth. Then I have a cup of tea and get ready for school. My dad wakes up and does the same. Then he drops me off at school. We work until 10.30, then we have break. I buy crisps from the tuckshop. After break we have have more tasks to be finished by 12.00. If we don't finish we have to do them in the after noon. I have school dinner and then a long play. Some afternoons we have games or art or stories. Then it is 3.30, home time. At home I have my tea. When my mum comes home from work I help her. I do the washing up. Then I help my younger sister to read or do some work. She copies me and I do some sums for her. We have dinner after that and then I sit with my mum. I do some homework. Then it is time for bed.
